name: Magistral Small
description: Small multimodal reasoning model with transparent step-by-step thinking. 24B parameters, fully open-source under Apache 2.0.
notes: Released September 2025 (v1.2). Budget-friendly reasoning model with image understanding. Recommended max context: 40K tokens. GPU requirements: 56GB (bf16), 28GB (fp8), 14GB (fp4).
